title: Culturing Symbiodinium
original description: we generated five clonal, axenic strains of Symbiodinium. These strains were assigned to clades A (two strains), B, E, and F based on their chloroplast 23S rDNA sequences. Growth studies in liquid cultures showed that the clade B strain and one of the clade A strains were able to grow photoautotrophically (in light with no fixed carbon), mixotrophically (in light with fixed carbon), or heterotrophically (in dark with fixed carbon). Here this protocol describes the steps of culturing SSB01 in different types of medium as an example.
ai_generated_description: This molecular biology protocol aims to culture five clonal, axenic strains of Symbiodinium in different types of media, including photoautotrophically, mixotrophically, and heterotrophically. The protocol provides detailed steps for preparing various media types and inoculating Symbiodinium cultures, allowing for the comparison of growth conditions in these different environments.

# Protocol steps
asw = prepare_asw(salt_amount=37.1, water_volume="1L", salinity_range=(32, 34))
prepare_asw(salt_amount=37.1, water_volume="1L", salinity_range=(32, 34))
imk_medium = prepare_imk_medium(powder_amount=2.56, asw_volume=asw)
filter_sterilize(imk_medium, filter_size="0.22 µm")
autoclaved_asw = autoclave(prepare_glass_flask_solution(asw_volume="90 mL", flask_volume="250 mL"), temperature=121, time="30 min")
cool_solution(autoclaved_asw)
imk_solution = mix_solutions(autoclaved_asw, imk_medium, final_volume="100 mL")

casein_asw = dissolve_substrate(substrate_amount=0.4, asw_volume="90 mL")
autoclaved_casein_asw = autoclave(casein_asw, temperature=121, time="30 min")
cool_solution(autoclaved_casein_asw)
imk_cas_solution = mix_solutions(autoclaved_casein_asw, imk_medium, final_volume="100 mL")

glucose_asw = dissolve_substrate(substrate_amount=0.5, asw_volume="90 mL")
autoclaved_glucose_asw = autoclave(glucose_asw, temperature=121, time="30 min")
cool_solution(autoclaved_glucose_asw)
imb_glc_solution = mix_solutions(autoclaved_glucose_asw, imk_medium, final_volume="100 mL")

autoclaved_mb_medium = autoclave(mb_medium, temperature=121, time="30 min")
cool_solution(autoclaved_mb_medium)
filtered_mb_medium = filter_precipitation(autoclaved_mb_medium, filter_size="0.45 µm")

picked_colonies = pick_colonies_from_agar(src_plate="agar plate with Symbiodinium colonies")
grow_cultures(temperature=27, light_intensity="10 µmol photons m-2 s-1")
# end of protocol
